# network interface settings; autogenerated
# Please do NOT modify this file directly, unless you know what
# you're doing.
#
# If you want to manage parts of the network configuration manually,
# please utilize the 'source' or 'source-directory' directives to do
# so.
# PVE will preserve these directives, but will NOT read its network
# configuration from sourced files, so do not attempt to move any of
# the PVE managed interfaces into external files!

auto lo
iface lo inet loopback

iface enp2s0 inet manual

iface enp3s0 inet manual

iface enp4s0 inet manual

iface enp5s0 inet manual

iface enp6s0 inet manual

iface enp7s0 inet manual

auto vmbr0
iface vmbr0 inet static
	address 10.38.110.15/24
	gateway 10.38.110.1
	bridge-ports enp2s0
	bridge-stp off
	bridge-fd 0
	bridge-vlan-aware yes
	bridge-vids 2-4094
#Host-MGMT-eth00

auto vmbr101
iface vmbr101 inet manual
	bridge-ports enp3s0
	bridge-stp off
	bridge-fd 0
	bridge-vlan-aware yes
	bridge-vids 2-4094
#VM-MGMT-eth01

auto vmbr102
iface vmbr102 inet manual
	bridge-ports enp4s0
	bridge-stp off
	bridge-fd 0
#Physical-eth02

auto vmbr103
iface vmbr103 inet manual
	bridge-ports enp5s0
	bridge-stp off
	bridge-fd 0
#Physical-eth03

auto vmbr104
iface vmbr104 inet manual
	bridge-ports enp6s0
	bridge-stp off
	bridge-fd 0
#Physical-eth04

auto vmbr105
iface vmbr105 inet static
	address 10.38.255.15/24
	bridge-ports enp7s0
	bridge-stp off
	bridge-fd 0
#Direct_MGMT-eth05

auto vmbr301
iface vmbr301 inet manual
	bridge-ports none
	bridge-stp off
	bridge-fd 0
#SSR-S1

auto vmbr302
iface vmbr302 inet manual
	bridge-ports none
	bridge-stp off
	bridge-fd 0
	mtu 9192
#SSR-S2

auto vmbr500
iface vmbr500 inet manual
	bridge-ports none
	bridge-stp off
	bridge-fd 0
#C-A-Bridge

auto vmbr501
iface vmbr501 inet manual
	bridge-ports none
	bridge-stp off
	bridge-fd 0
#C-S-Bridge

auto vmbr502
iface vmbr502 inet manual
	bridge-ports none
	bridge-stp off
	bridge-fd 0
#Client-Bridge

auto home
iface home inet manual
	vlan-id 40
	vlan-raw-device enp3s0
